version_description:
Thanks for using Wickr Me and sharing your feedback with us! Please keep it coming!
- Processing optimizations
- General Enhancements

Thanks for using Wickr Me and sharing your feedback with us! Please keep it coming!

Thanks for using Wickr Me and sharing your feedback with us! Please keep it coming!

- New Contacts UI to enhance the overall user experience of creating Convos and finding Contacts that are already in your Contacts (or already on your device).

- Platform stability improvements

- General enhancements

- Infrastructure optimizations
- General Improvements

Thanks for using Wickr Me!

Wickr Me - trusted by millions worldwide to secure the most critical communications.

In this update of Wickr Me, enjoy these new most requested features:

- *New* Secure 1:1 Calls
- *New* Secure Voice Memos. Send fully encrypted Voice Memos to rooms or conversations. Simply tap and hold the microphone icon to send up to a 1 minute Voice Memo.
- Workaround patch for iOS version 11.2.5 and below for crash caused by Indic scripts
- Secure Group/Room calling and screen sharing capability when initiated by a Wickr Pro user
- When on secure call with Pro user, Wickr Me user can view Pro user video. Secure video is only available for Pro accounts
- General enhancements
- Platform stability improvements
- Infrastructure optimizations

Thanks for using Wickr Me!

In this update of Wickr Me:

- *New* Setting to turn on/off 3rd party keyboards
- Fixed an issue some users were having with Voice Memo’s
- New Secure 1:1 Calls
- New Secure Voice Memos. Send fully encrypted Voice Memos to rooms or conversations. Simply tap and hold the microphone icon to send up to a 1 minute Voice Memo.
- Workaround patch for iOS version 11.2.5 and below for crash caused by Indic scripts
- Secure Group/Room calling and screen sharing capability when initiated by a Wickr Pro user
- When on secure call with Pro user, Wickr Me user can view Pro user video. Secure video is only available for Pro accounts
- General enhancements
- Platform stability improvements
- Infrastructure optimizations

Wickr is pleased to announce Screenshot Detection in this release! Screenshot notifications were prioritized as one of the most frequently requested features by our users!

Privacy for our users is our #1 priority. Wickr puts you in control of your messages with this frequently requested feature!

While there is no privacy silver bullet, transparency around capturing messages enables trust and helps set privacy expectations between you and your contacts.

- *New* Screenshot Detection
- General enhancements
- Infrastructure optimizations
- Fixed an issue with screenshot detection some users where experiencing

We love hearing from our users, especially when they request features! Keep the feedback coming.

App Previews and Screenshots
Screenshots must be in the JPG or PNG format, and in the RGB color space. App previews must be in the M4V, MP4, or MOV format and can’t exceed 500 MB. Learn More

Recently Released Features:
* On-Hold calling feature. While on a Wickr Call, accept a regular/Voip call and your Wickr call will automatically go On-Hold and return to Wickr after regular call ends (No audio or video Wickr data will be transmitted.)
* Longer in-App video’s messages
* Search for follow-up on starred messages, files, and images is now available in rooms and convos!
* How to star messages: swipe left to star/delete/recall a message or file
* Seamlessly switch between Bluetooth, Speaker and Earpiece while on a call
* Screenshot Detection
* Secure 1:1 Calls
* Secure Voice Memos

* General enhancements
* Infrastructure optimizations

Are your VOIP calls blocked by the wifi in your neighborhood coffee shop? With our new TCP calling fallback feature, secure voice calls are now smooth and seamless! Wickr makes connecting with friends and family easy and secure while you’re on the go!

Newly Released Features:

* Enable TCP Calling in settings to make Wickr calls (If a wifi network is blocking UDP calling)
* General enhancements
* Infrastructure optimizations

Recently Released:

* Avatar UI enhancement Avatar red halo status ring removed - now you can simply click/tap on a User’s avatar to check their in/out-of-network status.
* Seamlessly switch between devices while on a call
* Calling UI Button enhancement
* Updated copy for notifications for Rooms, Convos and @mentions
* Updated UI for registration/login
* Group conversations hide your name from convo name
* On-Hold calling feature. While on a Wickr Call, accept a regular/Voip call and your Wickr call will automatically go On-Hold and return to Wickr after regular call ends.
* Longer in-App video’s messages
* Search for follow-up on starred messages, files, and images is now available in rooms and convos!
* How to star messages: swipe left to star/delete/recall a message or file
* Seamlessly switch between Bluetooth, Speaker and Earpiece while on a call
* Screenshot Detection
* Secure 1:1 Calls
* Secure Voice Memos

Are your VOIP calls blocked by the wifi in your neighborhood coffee shop? With our new TCP calling fallback feature, secure voice calls are now smooth and seamless! Wickr makes connecting with friends and family easy and secure while you’re on the go!


Newly Released Features:

* Fixed some notification issues frequently reported by users
* Call ringing silenced when notifications are disabled in Wickr settings
* Improved call connection speed
* General enhancements
* Infrastructure optimizations

Recently Released:

* Enable TCP Calling in settings to make Wickr calls (If a wifi network is blocking UDP calling)
* Avatar UI enhancement Avatar red halo status ring removed - now you can simply click/tap on a User’s avatar to check their in/out-of-network status.
* Seamlessly switch between devices while on a call
* Calling UI Button enhancement
* Updated copy for notifications for Rooms, Convos and @mentions
* Badge count will be updated when reading a message on another device
* Updated UI for registration/login
* Group conversations hide your name from convo name
* Fixed: Some users reported room or group conversation gets hidden, If you send control message in offline mode
* On-Hold calling feature. While on a Wickr Call, accept a regular/Voip call and your Wickr call will automatically go On-Hold and return to Wickr after regular call ends.
* On-Hold calling feature. Enable On-Hold if you accept a second VOIP call or need to talk to someone in person while on a Wickr call. (No audio or video Wickr data will be transmitted.)
* Longer in-App video’s messages
* Search for follow-up on starred messages, files, and images is now available in rooms and convos!
* How to star messages: swipe left to star/delete/recall a message or file
* Seamlessly switch between Bluetooth, Speaker and Earpiece while on a call
* Screenshot Detection
* Secure 1:1 Calls
* Secure Voice Memos

Wickr Me - trusted by millions worldwide to secure the most critical communications.

We love hearing from our users, especially when you request features! Keep the feedback coming!

In this version, we’re introducing a few new enhancements to the Wickr experience. We hope you enjoy them!
* We continue to address bugs as we find them. Please share any feedback and issues to support@wickr.com.

We’re back with another WickrMe release. Please enjoy the following enhancements:

- Call Confirmation: we’ve heard a lot of pain from users initiating accidental calls. The application will now prompt you to confirm you’re trying to start a call and let you know how many participants will receive the call.
- Markdown: Limited support for markdown formatting added, including *bold*, _italic_, ~strikethrough~, `inline code`, and ```code blocks```.
We continue to address bugs as we find them. Please share any feedback and issues to support@wickr.com.

Thank you for continuing to support WickrMe!

Wickr Me - trusted by millions worldwide to secure the most critical communications.

Newly Released Features:

* Enhanced notifications for messages & calls
* Fixed an issue some users were having with “Network Error” banner displaying incorrectly
* Improved UX for “Share with” files
* General enhancements
* Infrastructure optimizations

Recently Released:

* Fixed some notification issues frequently reported by users
* Call ringing silenced when notifications are disabled in Wickr settings
* Improved call connection speed
* Enable TCP Calling in settings to make Wickr calls (If a wifi network is blocking UDP calling)
* Avatar UI enhancement Avatar red halo status ring removed - now you can simply click/tap on a User’s avatar to check their in/out-of-network status.
* Seamlessly switch between devices while on a call
* Calling UI Button enhancement
* Updated copy for notifications for Rooms, Convos and @mentions
* Badge count will be updated when reading a message on another device
* Updated UI for registration/login
* Group conversations hide your name from convo name
* Fixed: Some users reported room or group conversation gets hidden, If you send control message in offline mode
* On-Hold calling feature. While on a Wickr Call, accept a regular/Voip call and your Wickr call will automatically go On-Hold and return to Wickr after regular call ends.
* Longer in-App video’s messages
* Search for follow-up on starred messages, files, and images is now available in rooms and convos!
* How to star messages: swipe left to star/delete/recall a message or file
* Seamlessly switch between Bluetooth, Speaker and Earpiece while on a call
* Screenshot Detection
* Secure 1:1 Calls
* Secure Voice Memos

We love hearing from our users, especially when you request features! Keep the feedback coming!

Thank you for your continued support of WickrMe!

We’re introducing a new way to share file attachments with your fellow Wickr users with File Pinning. In group conversations, you can now “pin” previously shared files to the conversation. These files are persistent for the life of the conversation (or until unpinned) and are available to new participants without having to re-share.

Per usual, we’re squashing bugs as we find them. We hope you enjoy the latest version of WickrMe!

This week’s release is focused on minor bug fixes and other general enhancements.
Thank you for your continued support of WickrMe!

Wickr Me - trusted by millions worldwide to secure the most critical communications.

- Refreshed app settings to improve organization and user experience
- Users may now delete their user profile avatar

Wickr Me - trusted by millions worldwide to secure the most critical communications.

- General enhancements and bug fixes.
- General Enhancement & Bug Fixes

Wickr Me - trusted by millions worldwide to secure the most critical communications.

Improved User Verification: easily validate the security of your end-to-end encryption with your contacts through shared security verification codes, or simply scan a QR code on their screen.
Customer Support Logging: users can enable application logs to share with customer support if things go wrong. This is turned off by default. Your application logs are stored locally on device and can be erased at anytime.
Added support for security code autofill with QuickType.
Improved call quality.
General enhancements and bug fixes.

**New** Wickr Open Access. Enable this ‘smart VPN’ feature when you are geo-blocked or have network limitations via Settings->Server Management
* Updated calling icons, clearer distinction between On/Off states
* Improvements to Contact Finder
* New Contacts section added to Contact Page
* General enhancements
* Infrastructure optimizations

Recently Released:

* Enhanced notifications for messages & calls
* Fixed an issue some users were having with “Network Error” banner displaying incorrectly
* Improved UX for “Share with” files
* Fixed some notification issues frequently reported by users
* Call ringing silenced when notifications are disabled in Wickr settings
* Improved call connection speed
* Enable TCP Calling in settings to make Wickr calls (If a wifi network is blocking UDP calling)
* Avatar UI enhancement Avatar red halo status ring removed - now you can simply click/tap on a User’s avatar to check their in/out-of-network status.
* Seamlessly switch between devices while on a call
* Updated copy for notifications for Rooms, Convos and @mentions
* Badge count will be updated when reading a message on another device
* Updated UI for registration/login
* Group conversations hide your name from convo name
* Fixed: Some users reported room or group conversation gets hidden, If you send control message in offline mode
* On-Hold calling feature. While on a Wickr Call, accept a regular/Voip call and your Wickr call will automatically go On-Hold and return to Wickr after regular call ends.
* Longer in-App video’s messages
* Search for follow-up on starred messages, files, and images is now available in rooms and convos!
* How to star messages: swipe left to star/delete/recall a message or file
* Seamlessly switch between Bluetooth, Speaker and Earpiece while on a call
* Screenshot Detection
* Secure 1:1 Calls
* Secure Voice Memos

**New** Wickr Open Access. Enable this ‘smart VPN’ feature when you are geo-blocked or have network limitations via Settings->Server Management
* Corrected an issue some users were experiencing while adding a phone number to their Wickr account
* Updated calling icons, clearer distinction between On/Off states
* Improvements to Contact Finder
* New Contacts section added to Contact Page
* General enhancements
* Infrastructure optimizations
Recently Released:

* Enhanced notifications for messages & calls
* Fixed an issue some users were having with “Network Error” banner displaying incorrectly
* Improved UX for “Share with” files
* Call ringing silenced when notifications are disabled in Wickr settings
* Improved call connection speed
* Enable TCP Calling in settings to make Wickr calls (If a wifi network is blocking UDP calling)
* User management feature Makes User(s) status change management so much easier! If a user becomes inactive (may have been removed from a network or changed networks via the Admin Console) a Moderator who enters a room where a participant’s user status has changed will be presented an option to manage those users.
* Avatar UI enhancement Avatar red halo status ring removed - now you can simply click/tap on a User’s avatar to check their in/out-of-network status.
* Seamlessly switch between devices while on a call
* Deleted/Inactive users will be removed from your Contact list
* Updated copy for notifications for Rooms, Convos and @mentions
* Badge count will be updated when reading a message on another device
* Single Sign On [SSO] now available - enables access control and seamless integration to connected systems with a single ID and password.
* Updated UI for registration/login
* Group conversations hide your name from convo name
* Enterprise directory search
* On-Hold calling feature. While on a Wickr call, accept and receive a regular/VOIP mobile calls. Your Wickr call will automatically go On-Hold, and return to Wickr after regular call ends.
* Search for follow-up on starred messages, files, and images is now available in rooms and convos!
* How to star messages: swipe left to star/delete/recall a message or file
* Seamlessly switch between Bluetooth, Speaker and Earpiece while on a call
* Screenshot Detection
* Secure Voice Memos
* Secure Voice Calling for up to 20!

Wickr Pro - trusted by millions worldwide to secure their most critical communications. Businesses choose Wickr to collaborate securely, facilitate data management and retention policies across their organizations.

Thank you for your continued support of WickrMe! This release focuses on improving the calling experience and fixing bugs. We’ve also added support to show when you are in a room or conversation with users outside the WickrMe Network.

Thank you for your continued support of WickrMe!

We’re introducing a new way to share file attachments with your fellow Wickr users with File Pinning. In group conversations, you can now “pin” previously shared files to the conversation. These files are persistent for the life of the conversation (or until unpinned) and are available to new participants without having to re-share.

Per usual, we’re squashing bugs as we find them. We hope you enjoy the latest version of WickrMe!

* We continue to address bugs as we find them. Please share any feedback and issues to support@wickr.com.

We’re back with another WickrMe release. Please enjoy the following enhancements:

- Call Confirmation: we’ve heard a lot of pain from users initiating accidental calls. The application will now prompt you to confirm you’re trying to start a call and let you know how many participants will receive the call.
- Markdown: Limited support for markdown formatting added, including *bold*, _italic_, ~strikethrough~, `inline code`, and ```code blocks```.
We continue to address bugs as we find them. Please share any feedback and issues to support@wickr.com.

Thank you for continuing to support WickrMe!

We’re back with another WickrMe release. In this release you’ll find:

- Squashed some minor bugs.

Thank you for continuing to support WickrMe!

In this release, we’re introducing Message Replies. Users can now reply to a specific message in their chat, making rooms and groups chats easier to understand who is replying to whom. Message replies will include the original quoted message, and tapping/clicking on the reply will navigate a user to the original message.

Each release also includes minor enhancements and bug fixes. Thank you for continuing to support WickrMe!
Thank you for your continued support of Wickr Me! This release is focused on bug fixes and minor enhancements.
Thank you for your continued support of Wickr Me! This release is focused on bug fixes and minor enhancements.

- Fixed an issue where other Me users would display Wickr Pro users.
- Fixed an issue where the keyboard would overlap your message replies.
- Fixed an issue where @-mentions in a message reply displayed blue.
- Fixed an issue where some users could not join calls
- General enhancements and bug fixes
- general enhancements and bug fixes
General enhancements and bug fixes

This release focuses on general enhancements and bug fixes.
- Fixed an issue where Me users couldn’t join certain calls.

This release is focused on bug fixes and other general enhancements.
- Fixed an issue where Wickr Me users would be displayed as Wickr Pro users.

This release is focused on bug fixes and other general enhancements.

- Fixed an issue where a user could long-press on message types that shouldn’t support the long press.
- Fixed an issue where the app wouldn’t display a warning when attempting to reconnect to a network connection when Wickr Open Access was on.

New Year, new features from Team Wickr!

- We’ve expanded message replies to handle more message types like images, files, location sharing, and more.
- Fixed an issue where users would still receive messages from people they blocked.

Thank you for using Wickr Me. We’re constantly making improvements to the app and behind the scenes.

- Group members can rename Saved Items. Cryptic file names can now be a thing of the past.

Thank you for using Wickr Me. We’re constantly making improvements to the app and behind the scenes. Here’s what we have in this week’s release:

- Link Previews - users can now (optionally) turn on the ability to send link previews. The sender can pull specific metadata from a URL such as a web page title, description and an image to provide recipients with additional context to the link.
- general enhancements and bug fixes

Thank you for using Wickr Me. This release is focused on general enhancements and bug fixes.

- Fixed an issue where some users could not turn on biometric authentication.
- Fixed an issue where a user would show up in their own contact list.

Thank you for using Wickr Me! This update is focused on general enhancements and bug fixes.

- Users can now add links to “Saved Items”
- Dark/light mode will now match your iOS settings.
- bug fixes and general enhancements

Thank you for using Wickr Pro! This week’s release is focused on general enhancements and bug fixes such as:

- Group conversations will now be included in a new “Rooms” list. Conversations have been changed to “Direct Messages”
- We’ve added some error messaging to give you more information when your messages don’t make it to their intended user, or when their messages don’t make it to you. For more information, visit support.wickr.com.
- Fixed an issue that broke paging on the contacts screen
- Fixed an issue where screenshots would not trigger a message.
- Improved contacts screen fuzzy search results

Thank you for using Wickr Me! We’ve heard your feedback on our recent release and are exploring ways to improve. This release is focused on general bug fixes and enhancements.
- general enhancements and bug fixes

- General enhancements and bug fixes
- Call participants are now sorted alphabetically

- General enhancements and bug fixes
- Call participants are now sorted alphabetically

This release is focused on general enhancements and bug fixes.

- CallKit support added. You can enable this in your Notification settings.
- bug fixes and general enhancements

This release is focused on general enhancements and bug fixes.

- Added new ‘Appearances’ setting to allow users to set the width of text message bubbles.

In this release, we’re happy to announce a much asked for a feature: emoji reactions! Use emoji reactions as a quick response to any message or poll your friends and colleagues. Long press any message to apply emoji reactions.

- We are also dropping support for iOS 10.
- Fixed a bug that where a user could not turn off burn-on-read once set
- bug fixes and general enhancements
- bug fixes and general enhancements

In this release, we’ve made some improvements under the hood for messaging. These improvements allow users to communicate with up to 500 people in a room without a significant slow down due to message encryption.

- Introducing “Audio Only” calling, for use in low bandwidth situations. This will prevent other caller’s video and screen share from streaming to your device, improving call performance in low bandwidth situations. You can find this toggle under Settings > Connectivity.
- bug fixes and general enhancements

Thank you for using Wickr Me! Wickr is now expanding federation for Me users to communicate with Wickr Enterprise users. Now you can communicate with both Wickr Pro and Wickr Enterprise users.

- Various general enhancements and bug fixes.
- bug fixes and general enhancements

Thank you for using Wickr Me! In this release we are happy to introduce some new and amazing features:

- Users can view an active in-progress call banner in a Room/Group and can easily join a call vs searching for the “click to join” call message
- Users can view “add more moderators” reminder banner after Room creation to ensure there are always back-up/alternate moderators for Room controls
- Users can sort their Rooms/Groups/Direct Messages by most recent & by names (alphanumeric)
- Users can drag their desired items (text, image) and drop it into our Wickr app seamlessly
Thank you for using Wickr Me! This release is focused on general enhancements and bug fixes.

This release is focused on enhancing the experience of finding messages that are important to you. Your rooms list will now display an extra unread badge for rooms that you have been @-mentioned in. Additionally, users will now enter a room at their last read message, not the latest unread message. Users can toggle between all unread @-mentions without needing to scroll.

- Fixed an issue where users could not send messages to other verified users.
- General enhancements and bug fixes.
- bug fixes and general enhancements
- bug fixes and general enhancements

- This release is focused on general enhancements and bug fixes.
- Users can now switch to audio-only during a call

- Fixed an issue where users could not join calls initiated by Wickr Pro users

Thank you for updating to the latest Wickr Me! This release is focused on minor improvements and bug fixes.

- Users can now enable or disable Message Drafts [Settings > Privacy & Security]. When enabled, unsent messages will be preserved when a user navigates away from a conversation.
- General enhancements & bug fixes.

Thank you for updating to the latest Wickr Me!

We’re improving our calling experience by switching our audio codec to Opus (instead of AAC). You should experience improved audio quality overall.
- general bug fixes and enhancements

Thank you for updating to the latest Wickr Me!

This update introduces language localization support for German and Spanish

Thank you for updating to the latest Wickr Me! We’re excited to announce the introduction of a much-requested feature: pinned chats! Have a room or conversation you want to keep at the top of your list? just long-press or swipe right for any chat and pin it to the top of your list.

- All Rooms and DMs with unread messages now show in a dynamic “Unread” inbox at the top of your list

Thank you for updating to the latest version of Wickr Me! Did our message delete options confuse you? Say no more… we’ve consolidated that action so that if you delete one of your own messages, it will delete the message across everyone else’s device. Deleting someone else’s message only deletes it from your device.

- Users now have the option to play a tone when a call participant drops off an active call. Go to Settings > Call Settings to enable.
- Added a ‘Legal’ section under Settings > Support that details our use of open source licensing
- Added & enhanced the user interface identifiers for Bots, so users can easily tell when they are interacting with non-humans. [Desktop] Bots will have their own listing separate from - Rooms and Direct Messages.
- Users can now reply to a text message directly from the notification (iPhone and Apple Watch only).
- This release drops support for iOS 12 and below.
- General enhancements and bug fixes
- bug fixes and general enhancements

Thank you for updating to the latest version of Wickr Pro! This version is focused on general enhancements and bug fixes.

We’ve made some UI updates to the registration page, including better validation of usernames and passwords.
